hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Huge Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Market Potion Shop#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Piece of the Triforce#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path of #gold#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Strength Upgrade#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #3# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #treasure chest game# grants #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #1# major item.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Bow#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Back Left Bombable Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path of #gold#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that those who seek #sunken silver rupees# will find #a Strength Upgrade#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Deku Stick Capacity# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #a Magic Meter#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the true reward is the friends we made along the way.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Bow Shooting Gallery#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the fastest way forward is walking backwards.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path of #gold#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: You're comparing yourself to me?^Ha! You're not even good enough to be my fake.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Zora Tunic#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial First Right Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Strength Upgrade#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #Deku Stick Capacity#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Magic Meter#.
